entries.title: Army lieutenant pepper-sprayed by police awarded $3,600 in lawsuit
entries.description: A Black soldier in uniform who was pepper-sprayed in his car by Virginia police officers during a traffic stop has been awarded less than $4,000.

entries.title: Dad arrested after 4-year-old boy captured playing with gun alone: Police
entries.description: An Indiana man was arrested after his 4-year-old son was captured on security camera footage playing with a loaded gun in their apartment complex's hallway alone.

entries.title: Evidence so far doesn't justify FBI search for documents at Biden home, experts say
entries.description: They say Biden's cooperation versus Trump's resistance is a critical difference.

entries.title: Man convicted in Ahmaud Arbery murder moved to medical prison
entries.description: Gregory McMichael, one of three men convicted of killing Ahmaud Arbery, has been moved to Augusta State Medical Prison.

entries.title: Democratic governor seeks to expand abortion access in Maine
entries.description: Maine Gov. Janet Mills, legislative leaders want to expand access to abortion.

entries.title: Husband charged with murder of missing mom of 3
entries.description: The husband of Ana Walshe, a Massachusetts mother of three who has been missing for more than two weeks, has been charged with her murder, according to a warrant.

entries.title: WATCH:  Epic ‘ski wedding’ photoshoot goes viral
entries.description: Gabrielle Stowe’s stunning ski wedding photographs of couples tying the knot on the slopes and celebrating with friends and family in style are taking the internet by storm.

entries.title: Groups: 'No evidence' offshore wind killing whales in NJ-NY
entries.description: There have been whale deaths near site preparation work for offshore wind farms.

entries.title: Wisconsin judge dismisses complaint against GOP fake elector
entries.description: A Wisconsin judge has dismissed an open records complaint against a Republican member of the Wisconsin Elections Commission who served as a fake elector for former President Donald Trump

entries.title: Residents of one town take drastic measures after water supply is cut off
entries.description: Residents of an Arizona town have resorted to drastic measures to conserve and use water after the city of Scottsdale cut off its water supply due to the extreme drought.

entries.title: Feds to drop charges against NYPD officer accused of being spy for China
entries.description: Federal prosecutors in Brooklyn have asked a judge to dismiss criminal charges against an NYPD officer charged with being a Chinese agent.

entries.title: World Food Program chief Somali famine slowed, not avoided
entries.description: Support from donors like the U.S. and Germany helped WFP to postpone famine.

entries.title: National Hurricane Center issues rare January tropical weather outlook
entries.description: The National Hurricane Center on Monday issued a rare tropical weather outlook for January.

entries.title: Idaho murders suspect wrote about 'delusions of grandeur' in online forum
entries.description: University of Idaho quadruple murder suspect Bryan Kohberger posted in an online forum years ago that he had "crazy thoughts."

entries.title: Norway wants to talk to asylum-seeker from Wagner Group
entries.description: A Norwegian police unit that investigates war crimes wants to talk to a Russian asylum-seeker man who reportedly is a former high-ranking member of the private Russian military contractor Wagner Group

entries.title: UK police reviewing cases after officer's serial rape plea
entries.description: Britain’s Metropolitan Police says it's reviewing more than 1,600 cases of alleged sexual offenses and domestic abuse involving its staff after it emerged that a London police officer who was a serial rapist managed to stay in his job for two decades

entries.title: Emerson reveals $7.6 billion bid for National Instruments
entries.description: Emerson is taking public its bid to buy National Instruments for $7.6 billion

entries.title: Death of California public defender in Mexico appears to be 'unfortunate accident'
entries.description: U.S. citizen Elliot Blair was found dead at a Mexican resort on Jan. 14.

entries.title: WATCH:  Arkansas player scores buzzer beater against Vanderbilt
entries.description: Makayla Daniels’ first-ever buzzer beater in the last seconds of the game helped seal the Razorbacks’ 84-81 win over the Commodores.

entries.title: Flyer filmed Nepal crash; co-pilot met same fate as husband
entries.description: The twin-engine aircraft that crashed in Nepal and killed all 72 on board was co-piloted by Anju Khatiwada

entries.title: Norway archaeologists find 'world's oldest runestone'
entries.description: Archaeologists have found a runestone which they claim is the world’s oldest.

entries.title: Ukrainian civilians vanish and languish in Russian-run jails
entries.description: Many civilians have been detained by Russian forces since the war began.

entries.title: Mom dies trying to rescue 6-year-old daughter as family home burned down
entries.description: A mother has died after rushing back into her burning home in an attempt to rescue her 6-year-old daughter stuck inside who also ended up dying in the fire.

entries.title: At least 8 shot during massive MLK Day celebration, authorities say
entries.description: At least eight people were shot in southeastern Florida on Monday during a massive celebration for Martin Luther King Jr. Day, authorities said.

entries.title: Ukraine first lady headlines first big day at Davos meeting
entries.description: Ukraine’s first lady will give a rare international address.

entries.title: Trial to open for man accused of threatening Kansas lawmaker
entries.description: A man is charged with threatening to kill one of the state’s congressmen.

entries.title: Tennis player denies using fake COVID-19 travel certificate
entries.description: Italian tennis player Camila Giorgi has denied allegations that she obtained a false COVID-19 vaccine certificate to allow her to travel

entries.title: Biden to host Netherlands PM for talks on tech, Ukraine
entries.description: President Joe Biden is set to host Dutch Prime Minister Mark Rutte for talks

entries.title: Police: 8 people shot, 1 critical at Florida MLK Day event
entries.description: Police in Florida say eight people were shot Monday during an MLK Jr. Day event, with one of the victims listed in critical condition

entries.title: Top US general visits training site for Ukrainian soldiers
entries.description: The top U.S. military officer, Army Gen. Mark Milley, has delivered a message to Ukrainian soldiers at a new training program in Germany: These are urgent times

entries.title: Former Republican candidate arrested for allegedly targeting Democrats' homes
entries.description: Four local Democratic officials in Albuquerque have had their homes or offices targeted by gunfire, police said.

entries.title: China announces first population decline in years
entries.description: China has announced its first overall population decline in recent years amid an aging society and plunging birthrate

entries.title: WATCH:  Eiffel Tower lit up in support of Iranian protesters
entries.description: The Eiffel Tower in Paris lit up with messages in support of demonstrators in Iran and women fighting for more rights.

entries.title: WATCH:  Humpback whales breach off the coast of North Carolina
entries.description: Humpback whales breached the waters near a North Carolina lighthouse—delighting onlookers boating in the area.

entries.title: WATCH:  Bereaved boy leads police patrol on toy bike
entries.description: After officers heard how much a bereaved boy loved the toy police bike he got for Christmas, they paid him a visit and he led a patrol around his block in full uniform.

entries.title: Biden to visit devastated areas of California
entries.description: President Joe Biden will travel to California’s central coast Thursday to visit areas that have been devastated by extreme weather

entries.title: WATCH:  Nepal plane crash black boxes recovered
entries.description: Investigators said they have recovered the flight recorders from the airplane that crashed in Nepal.

entries.title: Jury selection to begin in US trial of Mexico's former top cop
entries.description: Garcia Luna, the former Mexican secretary of public security, was arrested in Dallas in 2019 and charged with narcotics trafficking conspiracy.

entries.title: Boy, 11, fatally shot in Dallas by teen arguing with another
entries.description: Dallas police say a 14-year-old girl fatally shot an 11-year-old boy at a Dallas apartment complex parking lot after retrieving a gun during an argument with another child

entries.title: Biden, Harris and thousands of DC residents celebrate MLK at local events
entries.description: On Monday, thousands gathered at the historic Martin Luther King Jr. Avenue in southeast Washington, D.C., for the city's annual peace walk and parade

entries.title: Former NFL player arrested in Mississippi on kidnap charge
entries.description: A former University of Mississippi and NFL football player has been arrested on kidnapping charges

entries.title: Search for Oklahoma girl, 4, turns to looking for her body
entries.description: An effort to locate a missing 4-year-old Oklahoma girl who authorities believe was killed by a caretaker has become a search for her remains

entries.title: Death of teacher after LAPD Taser incident, arrest: The complete timeline of events
entries.description: As investigators continue to probe the death of school teacher Keenan Anderson, they have released video and details about his Jan. 3 encounter with police officers.
